abstract: India’s Tata Steel has started talks with lenders including Citigroup to refinance as much as £3.5 billion ($5.4 billion) in loans for its British unit, Bloomberg News reported.
snippet: India’s Tata Steel has started talks with lenders including Citigroup to refinance as much as £3.5 billion ($5.4 billion) in loans for its British unit, Bloomberg News reported.
lead_paragraph: India’s Tata Steel has started talks with lenders, including Citigroup, to refinance as much as £3.5 billion ($5.4 billion) in loans for its British unit, Bloomberg News reported, citing sources with knowledge of the matter.

headline.main: Tata Steel Said to Be in Talks Over Refinancing Loans
